Html:
I couldn't not find the feature under documentation, but is it possible to save an Excel chart as an EMF file using PHPExcel?

Thanks.
Sorry for double post. I can also use any image type, excel -> jpeg or something. Thanks.
PHPExcel doesn't have any writer that will generate an image file directly. Your best bet would be to write as html, and then use a 3rd party library that can convert html to an image.
Or PDFs are essentially vector images -- you'd also need to convert it -- but is similar to EMF.
